Dead by Daylight hat es geschafft: Guten Horror in einer reinen Multiplayerkomponente und sowohl Stimmung als auch Spielspaß bleiben erhalten. Fans des Genres müssen gar nicht erst zögern, aber auch Freunde von interessanten Mehrspielermechaniken können bedenkenlos zugreifen. Dieses Spiel dürfte seine Popularität aufrechterhalten können und hoffentlich weiteren Spielen dieser Art den Weg ebnen.

Excelente modalidad de juego.
Huyes de un asesino o eres el asesino.
Los personajes y progresos son buenos.
Contiene datos sobre los personajes, habilidades, mapas y se puede jugar con amigos.
Aunque tiene un sistema semi competitivo, no deberías tomarlo tan literal.
Diviértete con sus mecánicas y sube tus categorías para obtener cosméticos muy interesantes.
Stupid gaym. you can even stuck on dog's poop slugish movement, Very stupid. If you are downloading for fun then i wont recommend you to download this because it's not fun anymore. Find other games.

Ne kadar kanserde olsanız oyuna dayanıp 100 saat kadar süre verirseniz. Ardından yavaş yavaş zevk aldığınızı fark edeceksiniz. Oyuna ilk kez başlıyorsanız meta perkleri açmanız gerekecek. O perkleri açana kadar sorun yaşayacaksınız. Ayrıca oyundaki "Spot" adı verilen katilden kaçmak için kullanılan cam ve paletlerin olduğu yerlerde oynamayı öğrenmeniz gerekiyor. Sabırsızlar oynamasınlar boşuna. Ayrıca bazı katiller sebepsiz sizi kampleyip, tünelleyebilir. Buna yapabilecek bir şeyiniz yok. Katil oynarsanız da ilk başlarda karşınıza bilmeyen survivorlar gelecek ardından oynadıkça bilenler gelecek ve içinizden geçecek. Ardından katil oynamanın ne kadar zor olduğunu anlayacaksınız :)
Czasem psycha sitting ale git jest
you are an angry killer with an axe , 4 dump people  running around you flashing lights in your face ... where is the respect ! back in my days people used to fear killers !  not run around them !!
心累了，今天回归第一天，玩人类全是挂机屠夫，玩屠夫全是车队，现在的环境怎么成这样了？真没意思，怀念以前的时候了。

한국 게임 회사였으면 운영 꼬라지가 트럭 10대는 꼬라박혀도 할말 없을 정도의 운영과 개판 패치 귀꽉 틀어막은 소통


버그는 고치지도 않고 속은 좁고 땅만 넓은 그 나라 에서 한국까지 꾸역꾸역 기어와서 핵쓰는 사람이 정말 많은데


패치는 정말 느리고 인디라는 철밥통 뒤에 숨어서 꼬우면 문명이나 해라 소리를 하는 개발진이 만든 게임


운영진은 진짜로 게임 해보지도 않음 망겜이라 그냥하는소리가 아니라 정말로 본인들이 만드는 게임에 관심이 없음

당장에 MMR시스템이랍시고 도입한거는 답이 없다
게임 막 산 뉴비랑 천시간 이천시간 유저랑 게임 잡아준다

서로 스트레스인데 이게 맞는 매칭이란다

참고로 MMR 비슷한게 1년전쯤있었다고 하는데 새롭게낸 시스템이랍시고 변한게 하나도없다

인디라는 방패 뒤에 숨어서 입터는게 아주 엄지가 자동으로 올라간다



운영쪽만 문제있냐 말하면 그것도 아닌게 유저들은 정상인가 하면 양반들은 많이 없음
특히 한국서버는 사람없다고 찡찡대면서 정작 고인물들이 뉴비 다 절단시킨다


시작한지 얼마 안된 뉴비들 상대로 티배깅부터 시작해서 온갖 비매너 행위란 행위는 다하고
끝나고나서도 굳이 채팅으로 욕박고 접으라고 말해준다


최소한 뉴비배려까지는 기대안하고 티배깅부터 비매너 행위만 안해줘도 좋을텐데
입터는데는 도가튼 한국인들 굳이 남을 까내리지 않으면 속이 안풀리는 양반들이 워낙에 많다


매력적인 살인마들과 유명한 캐릭터들의 콜라보 등으로 동 장르에서는 매우 잘만든 게임이라 생각하지만

정작 운영을 개판으로 하는 개발진과 양반못된 유저 수준 유입되는 '그 나라' 핵쟁이들때문에
게임에 손도 대기 싫어진다



이 게임은 저혈압 있는 사람들한테도 추천 안한다


술래잡기를 기대하고 라이트한 느낌으로 즐기러 온 사람들은 도망가라
В этой игре одно из самых токсичных коммьюнити, а виноват во всём Игорь.

Ive played at least 300 hours on this game on console and im barely reaching 100 rn and what ive learned since 2017 is pretty simple.
As a Survivor, first thing is to m1 gens until it finishes or get chased by killer, if the killer is focused on someone else, just keep m1ing gens, destroy hex's, heal teamates or yourself and cry when you want to get bold points when the gens are done and get hit by NOED, also, dont be a asshole and help your teamates like cmon.
As a Killer, if you dont find a survivor in the first minute 2 gens are sure to pop instantly, unless if your preparing traps then you better find a survivor soon, once you do find one either get a hit half a minute in or leave them since theyre wasting your time making more gens pop, which is where gen regressing perks come in and wow...they already popped your ruin and undying somehow, then lose your pride having to face camp to at least get a decent amount of bloodpoints after the trial.

in conclusion

Survivor is baby mode
Killer is dark souls level
a good game to play with your friends

Оценка игры: 8 из 10

Каждая локация сгенерирована случайным образом, поэтому вы никогда не знаете, чего ожидать. Случайные точки вашего появления означают, что вы никогда не будете чувствовать себя в безопасности, потому что мир и его опасности изменяются в каждой игре.

Есть только один способ повлиять на ход событий – грамотно, как можно дольше выигрывать время для своих тимейтов, разыгранные конструкции и перетяжки из одного лупа в другой, не дают возможность убийце поймать вас! Но это мастерство нужно оттачивать очень долго!

Good game, but before playing it you must learn a few rules (don't worry they are simple but necessary)

Rules for survivors:
Rule 1: Do whatever you want, you are amazing
Rule 2: Bold Dwight not allowed

Rules for killers:

General:
Rule 1: Survivors always right (non-negotiable)
Rule 2: You should never camp hooks, it's unfair and toxic
Rule 3: After hooking a survivor, you should immediately leave hook area
Rule 4: You shouldn't chase any survivors within 20m of hooked survivor
Rule 5: You are not allowed to visit area when survivor get unhooked
Rule 6:  You can't attack unhooked person, it's toxic
Rule 7:  You should never attack person who completing unhook action
Rule 8: You can't hook same person two times in a row
Rule 9: If the survivor on phase 2, you should find another survivor to hook
Rule 10: If all survivors are already in the second phase, you are allowed to hook them, but you must stop using killer skill
Rule 11: If you accidentally killed a survivor on the hook when people were left in the game at zero or first phase, you must allow all generators to be repaired
Rule 12: if any survivor dc, you should help survivors and let them free win
Rule 13: After 5 gents gets repaired, you are lose, stop playing and let them open gates
Rule 14: Camping hook when gates open, also not allowed, you should chase another survivors 
Rule 15: You shouldn't attack same person two times in a row, it's a tunneling
Rule 16: If during the chase you miss an attack, you should immediately stop chase also you are noob
Rule 17: Hits from killer skills doesn't count, all killers overbuffed, let them heal and stop use that
Rule 18: If one survivor on the ground and you see another survivor, you must start chasing him
Rule 19: Don't stop in front of the palettes, let survivor stun you
Rule 20: If you hit a survivor, remember the survivor let you do it, you are noob
Rule 21: When games begin, you must wait until one generator is repaired, after that you are allowed to move
Rule 22: If gen almost repaired, you shouldn't have to break it or camp, just accept the fact that you are a noob
Rule 23: If you see how survivor repairs gen, you should kick gen and only after that start chasing
Rule 24: You are not allowed to dc, it's toxic
Rule 25: You can't nod your head it's toxic
Rule 26: If you have hex totems, you are not allowed to camp them it's toxic
Rule 27: Stomp on boon totems is not allowed
Rule 28: All killers are overbuffed and you are noob
Rule 29: If you disagree with something, read rule 1

Perks and Addons:
Rule 30: You should NEVER use NOED!
Rule 31: Sloppy butcher, Thanatophobia not allowed!
Rule 32: If you want use Shadowborn admit that you are a noob
Rule 33: Franklin's Demise not allowed it's toxic
Rule 34: Tinkerer, Hex: Ruin, SBFL, Barbecue and Chilli, Bamboozle, Pop Goes The Weasel, Discordance, Corrupt Intervention, Infectious Fright, Hex: Undying. if you want to use one of these perks, admit that you are a noob
Rule 35: Lethal Pursuer, Starstruck should be removed soon and player who use them banned for cheating
Rule 36: No Way Out and Blood Warden not allowed, it's so toxic
Rule 37: All purple and red addons not allowed.

Killers:
Rule 38: Bubba not allowed, toxic
Rule 39: Rin not allowed, unbalanced
Rule 40: Nurse not allowed, unbalanced

Now you are ready to play! good luck and have fun *wink wink*
